data.title: U.S. favorite music genres 2018
data.meta_description: According to a study carried out by Deezer in May 2018, the most popular genre among Americans was rock music, with 56.8 percent of respondents stating that they were currently listening to music within this genre as of the date of survey.
data.text:
Music genres preferred by consumers in the U.S. 2018

Published by Statista Research Department,

Leading music genres according to consumers in the United States as of May 2018
